stimulusHtml: Assuming the government of a country imposes a tariff on its imports of foreign goods, what is the likely effect on the countryâ€™s currency in foreign exchange markets?
choicesHtml: The supply of the currency will increase and the currency will depreciate.
The supply of the currency will increase and the currency will appreciate.
The supply of the currency will decrease and the currency will appreciate.
The demand for the currency will decrease and the currency will appreciate.
The demand for the currency will increase and the currency will depreciate.
